WorkItem.ClosedComment: Doesn't matter, item is being removed, and it's the proc that puts it so high
WorkItem.Description: What I don't understand that Rawr 4.xxxx wants Trauma as BIS -Item for Mainhand. Another thing... after Optimize this Item gets enchanted with Heartsong. Thats not right, Trauma has a ItemLvL from 264 or 277, the enchant required a ItemLvL >= 300.

Comments.Message: Can you please provide your saved character sheet so that we can see what is happening?

Its my Restro-shaman, with 2 pieces T11... one thing its bad again.. in the (Raid) buff list.. is the T11 Set Bonus not listet, only Bonus from PvP Amor (Gladiator) so it cant go right used by the Optimize simulation..

Trauma (Main Hand) its listet a BIS - Item (Best in Slot)

Sorry my english (iam on German client).

Best Regards

Please don't put multiple issues in the same ticket. Trauma, the enchants and T11 2P need to be separated. We've already closed tickets about enchants on items <300. We won't be fixing that as there's no point (you shouldn't be wearing those items anyway and they are about to go away).

Also, please consider searching issues before posting.   If you choose specific fight settings, yes, Trauma can indeed be BiS per those exact fight settings.  These are heavy raid non-stop-chain-heal situations, which don't actually present themselves these days.

And another thing, stop using the term BiS.  There is no BiS when it comes to Rawr.  Top of the list is simply there because the settings you have put in count that as the best item at this time.  This confuses people when you use the term BiS, as BiS has historically meant best in that slot above all other items when you have that specific BiS gear set.

To get more realistic show of weapons, change your sustained time to about 3/4 of the way, set the fight length to 7-9 minutes, change your Burst style to RT/CH, and your Sustained to RT/HW.  The model is undergoing major changes to fix the confusion on setting up the variables.  

So you understand, no, this is not a bug.  You just happen to have the perfect-storm of variables setup that the healing proc beats all other bonus stats from the items better stat-wise than Trauma.  Changing even a few variables even slightly will make it vanish.

<Also, please consider searching issues before posting>
Have nothing found.

<To get more realistic show of weapons, change your sustained time to about 3/4 of the way,>
Think the Sustained Time Bar needs a scale for better setting up.
 
<set the fight length to 7-9 minutes, change your Burst style to RT/CH, and your Sustained to RT/HW>
Thats the mistake i have with the Variables setup.. I have setup what iam use in Game, with Cataclysm CH an HW are to many nerved, now i have to use many RT/GHW and RT/Healing Rain / CH...

Big thanks for the Help!

Best Regards

Dragonangel

Well Trauma is going to go the way of the Dodo anyway, given that I just updated the item cache in that, per requested by Jothay, I've removed all ICC gear except ilvl 277 T10 gear. This means all weapons from wrath are gone.
